Package Model

Class Stop

java.lang.Object
Model.Intersection
Model.Stop
public class Stop extends Intersection
Stop inherits Intersection and is an intersection with a duration and will be visited by the deliverer. A stop is either the tour departure, either part of a request. It can be the pickup stop or the delivery stop of the request. A stop is composed of:
  • An id which is the same as the intersection where the stop is located.
  • A latitude.
  • A longitude.
  • The list of all segments that are originated from this intersection.
  • An indication about if the intersection was visited when computing the shortest path (Dijkstra algorithm), updated at each call of Dijkstra.
  • The duration in seconds spent by the deliverer at this location.
  • The time when the deliverer reaches the stop.
  • The path to follow to reach the next stop of the tour.
Stops are created when loading requests by parsing an XML requests file.
Stop is the descendant of Intersection class.
Author:
H4122
See Also:
Intersection, Request, Segment, Path, Map.computeShortestPath(Stop, ArrayList), Controller.parseRequests(org.w3c.dom.Document)

  • Constructor Details

    • Stop

      public Stop()
      Default class constructor. Calls the constructor of its ancestor Intersection. Id, coordinates and duration are set to zero. The list of segments originated from this intersection is empty. The intersection is not visited. The arrival time and the next path are set to null.
      See Also:
      Intersection()

    • Stop

      public Stop​(long id, float latitude, float longitude, float stopDuration)
      Class constructor. Creates this stop with the id, the coordinates and the duration in parameters. The list of segments originated from this intersection is empty. The intersection is not visited. The arrival time and the next path are set to null.
      Parameters:
      id - The id of this intersection.
      latitude - Its latitude on the map.
      longitude - Its longitude on the map.
      stopDuration - The duration in seconds spent at the stop by the deliverer.
      See Also:
      Intersection(long, float, float)

    • equals

      public boolean equals​(Object obj)
      Overrides equals method in Intersection class. Compares the object in parameter to this stop. The specified object is identical to this stop if it is a stop, and it has the same id, same coordinates (latitude and longitude), same list of originated segments and same duration as this stop. Plus, if both of their arrival times are not null, their value are compared and if values are the same, stop are identical.
      Overrides:
      equals in class Intersection
      Parameters:
      obj - The object to be compared with.
      Returns:
      TRUE if the specified object and this stop are identical, FALSE otherwise.
      See Also:
      Intersection.equals(Object)
